# Program Structure Docs

## Program structure

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/fundamentals/program-structure/index.md): Learn about the structure of a C# program by using a skeleton program that contains all the required elements for a program.
- [Main method](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/fundamentals/program-structure/main-command-line.md): Learn about Main() and command-line arguments. The 'Main' method is the entry point of an executable program.
- [Top-level statements](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/fundamentals/program-structure/top-level-statements.md): Learn about top-level statements. You can create programs without the ceremony of a Program class and a Main method.
